mainText:
Promo: "Feel like royalty with Bank of Entitlement-where your every whim is our command!"

Visit Bank of Entitlement dot com for more.

ENTITLEMENT STORY: So, picture this: I stroll into Bank of Entitlement, right? The place practically kneels at my feet. Anyway, I waltz up to the teller and casually mention I'd like my bank statements printed on diamond-encrusted paper. Oh, the horror when they tell me they don't offer that service! I was so insulted, I demanded a throne to sit on while they rectified their mistake. And you know what? They did it. Because when I speak, people listen. It's just the natural order of things.
